projects.title: Alarm Clock
projects.summary: I could never make myself wake up on time, so I naturally went with the nuclear option. This custom Arduino-based alarm clock triggers my tea kettle, record player, and 2 strobe lights in a timed, automated sequence.
projects.description:
This system integrates an Arduino Nano with servos, relays, an OLED display, and a DS3231 real-time clock to execute a fully automated wake-up routine. At the programmed alarm time, it sequentially powers the tea kettle, starts the record player, and flashes high-intensity floodlights to ensure the user wakes up.

A rotary encoder provides precise time setting and alarm toggling, while the OLED display shows live clock data and system status.

The hardware setup features dual servos, two floodlight relays, and a modular pin configuration designed for durability, clear wiring, and easy modification, combining practical automation with a touch of chaos to guarantee a successful morning routine.
